Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are significantly delayed near Ashland/Lake due to police activity near Harlem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are significantly delayed near Ashland/lake due to police activity near Harlem. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
